title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses LeBron James continuing his dominant scoring streak throughout the month of March and what this says about his decision to join the Lakers back in 2018. He explains why Matt Ryan is the next NFL quarterback who will succeed late in his career after getting a fresh start with the Colts. He believes the trade market for Jimmy Garoppolo and Baker Mayfield is shrinking for this one reason. Plus, 6-time All Pro OL Joe Thomas joins the show to discuss the Browns future with Deshaun Watson at quarterback. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
